title: Generate SEO Keyword Search Volume Data using Google API
author: simonscrapes
workflow_json:
{"meta":{"instanceId":"6b6a2db47bdf8371d21090c511052883cc9a3f6af5d0d9d567c702d74a18820e"},"nodes":[{"id":"f4570aad-db25-4dcd-8589-b1c8335935de","name":"When clicking ‘Test workflow’","type":"n8n-nodes-base.manualTrigger","position":[480,1800],"parameters":{},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"1c1be9d6-3fd5-44c2-a7dd-d291b9efe65b","name":"Sticky Note1","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-260,1360],"parameters":{"color":4,"width":657.3293805248016,"height":843.3412992154545,"content":"## Generate SEO Keyword Search Volume Data using Google API

## Use Case
Generate accurate search volume data for SEO keyword research:
- You have a list of potential keywords to target for your website SEO but don't know their actual search volume
- You need historical data to identify seasonal trends in keyword popularity
- You want to assess keyword difficulty to prioritize your content strategy
- You need data-driven insights for planning your SEO campaigns

## What this Workflow Does
The workflow connects to Google's Keyword Planner API to retrieve keyword metrics for your SEO research:

- Fetches monthly search volume for each keyword
- Provides historical trends data for the past 12 months
- Calculates keyword difficulty scores
- Delivers competition metrics from Google Ads


## Setup
1. Fill the `Set 20 Keywords` with up to 20 Keywords of your choosing in an array e.g. ["keyword 1", "keyword 2",...]
2. Create a Google Ads API account and add credentials to `Get Search Data` node
3. Replace the `Connect to your own database` with your own database for the output


## How to Adjust it to Your Needs
- Change the `Set 20 Keywords` node input to a source of your choosing e.g. Airtable database with 20 keywords
- Connect to output source of your choosing

readme:
## Use Case

Generate accurate search volume data for SEO keyword research:

  * You have a list of potential keywords to target for your website SEO but don't know their actual search volume
  * You need historical data to identify seasonal trends in keyword popularity
  * You want to assess keyword difficulty to prioritize your content strategy
  * You need data-driven insights for planning your SEO campaigns



## What this Workflow Does

The workflow connects to Google's Keyword Planner API to retrieve keyword metrics for your SEO research:

  * Fetches monthly search volume for each keyword
  * Provides historical trends data for the past 12 months
  * Calculates keyword difficulty scores
  * Delivers competition metrics from Google Ads



## Setup

  1. Fill the `Set 20 Keywords` with up to 20 Keywords of your choosing in an array e.g. ["keyword 1", "keyword 2",...]
  2. Create a Google Ads API account and add credentials to `Get Search Data` node
  3. Replace the `Connect to your own database` with your own database for the output



## How to Adjust it to Your Needs

  * Change the `Set 20 Keywords` node input to a source of your choosing e.g. Airtable database with 20 keywords
  * Connect to output source of your choosing



More templates and n8n workflows >>> [@simonscrapes](https://www.youtube.com/@simonscrapes?sub_confirmation=1)
readme_html:
Use Case

Generate accurate search volume data for SEO keyword research:

  • You have a list of potential keywords to target for your website SEO but don't know their actual search volume
  • You need historical data to identify seasonal trends in keyword popularity
  • You want to assess keyword difficulty to prioritize your content strategy
  • You need data-driven insights for planning your SEO campaigns

What this Workflow Does

The workflow connects to Google's Keyword Planner API to retrieve keyword metrics for your SEO research:

  • Fetches monthly search volume for each keyword
  • Provides historical trends data for the past 12 months
  • Calculates keyword difficulty scores
  • Delivers competition metrics from Google Ads

Setup

  1. Fill the Set 20 Keywords with up to 20 Keywords of your choosing in an array e.g. ["keyword 1", "keyword 2",...]
  2. Create a Google Ads API account and add credentials to Get Search Data node
  3. Replace the Connect to your own database with your own database for the output

How to Adjust it to Your Needs

  • Change the Set 20 Keywords node input to a source of your choosing e.g. Airtable database with 20 keywords
  • Connect to output source of your choosing

More templates and n8n workflows >>> @simonscrapes
readme_zh:
## 使用场景

为SEO关键词研究生成精准搜索量数据：

  * 您已列出网站SEO待优化的关键词清单，但不确定其实际搜索量  
  * 需要历史数据来识别关键词热度的季节性波动规律  
  * 希望评估关键词难度以优化内容策略优先级  
  * 需数据支撑来规划SEO营销活动  

## 工作流功能

本工作流通过连接Google关键词规划师API获取SEO研究所需的关键词指标：  
  * 抓取每个关键词的月均搜索量  
  * 提供过去12个月的历史趋势数据  
  * 计算关键词难度评分  
  * 输出来自Google Ads的竞争程度指标  

## 配置步骤  
  1. 在`设置20个关键词`节点以数组形式填入最多20个关键词，例如["关键词1", "关键词2",...]  
  2. 创建Google Ads API账号并将凭证填入`获取搜索数据`节点  
  3. 将`连接您的数据库`节点替换为您自己的数据存储  

## 自定义调整建议  
  * 可将`设置20个关键词`节点改为其他数据源（如含20个关键词的Airtable数据库）  
  * 自由对接您偏好的输出数据存储  

更多模板及n8n工作流 >>> [@simonscrapes](https://www.youtube.com/@simonscrapes?sub_confirmation=1)
title_zh: 利用Google API生成SEO关键词搜索量数据
workflow_json_zh:
{"meta":{"instanceId":"6b6a2db47bdf8371d21090c511052883cc9a3f6af5d0d9d567c702d74a18820e"},"nodes":[{"id":"f4570aad-db25-4dcd-8589-b1c8335935de","name":"When clicking ‘Test workflow’","type":"n8n-nodes-base.manualTrigger","position":[480,1800],"parameters":{},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"1c1be9d6-3fd5-44c2-a7dd-d291b9efe65b","name":"Sticky Note1","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-260,1360],"parameters":{"color":4,"width":657.3293805248016,"height":843.3412992154545,"content":"## 利用Google API生成SEO关键词搜索量数据  

## 应用场景  
为SEO关键词研究生成精准的搜索量数据：  
- 您已列出网站SEO待优化的关键词列表，但不确定其实际搜索量  
- 需要历史数据来识别关键词热度的季节性趋势  
- 希望评估关键词难度以优化内容策略优先级  
- 需要数据驱动型洞察来规划SEO推广活动  

## 工作流功能  
本工作流连接Google关键词规划师API，获取SEO研究所需的关键词指标：  
- 获取每个关键词的月均搜索量  
- 提供过去12个月的历史趋势数据  
- 计算关键词难度分数  
- 输出来自Google Ads的竞争指标  

## 配置步骤  
1. 在`设置20个关键词`节点中以数组形式填入最多20个关键词，例如["关键词1", "关键词2",...]  
2. 创建Google Ads API账号并将凭证添加到`获取搜索数据`节点  
3. 将`连接您的数据库`节点替换为您自己的数据库以存储输出结果  

## 自定义调整指南  
- 将`设置20个关键词`节点更改为您选择的输入源（例如含20个关键词的Airtable数据库）  
- 连接到您指定的输出数据源
